message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee it's high-quality due to the inherent uncertainty, rest assured that our products are carefully selected with customer satisfaction in mind. Given the nature of this round, the product might be of lower quality, but we still stand by its value at $10000. If you're looking for a bargain, this could be an opportunity. Please consider your decision carefully, as all sales are final. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask!
